name: ListCodeownersErrors
description:
Identify syntax errors in a repository's CODEOWNERS file.

This tool checks a repository's CODEOWNERS file for any syntax errors. It's useful for ensuring that the file is correctly formatted and functioning as intended. Use this tool to diagnose issues with the CODEOWNERS file when configuring repository access controls.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: version_reference
parameters.description: Specify the branch, tag, or commit name to select the CODEOWNERS file version. Defaults to the repository's default branch if not provided.

value_schema.description: A branch, tag or commit name used to determine which version of the CODEOWNERS file to use. Default: the repository's default branch (e.g. `main`)

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: ref
parameters.description: A branch, tag or commit name used to determine which version of the CODEOWNERS file to use. Default: the repository's default branch (e.g. `main`)

value_schema.description: A branch, tag or commit name used to determine which version of the CODEOWNERS file to use. Default: the repository's default branch (e.g. `main`)

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
